title: Federation Teams Modal Actions
custom_preconds:
Wireframe: https://zpl.io/amdRoP9

GIVEN a user is logged in as BOC admin
AND user wants the ability to add federation teams to a tournament year so that the teams are available to federations for roster management
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the tournament management page
custom_expected:
THEN system should display an "Add Federation Teams" button
AND this clicking this button should trigger a modal
AND the modal should have an "Add Federation Teams" header
AND the modal should have an "X"
AND clicking the "X" should close the modal
AND the modal should have a searchable multi-select input
AND typing a country name should display a list of potential matches
AND selecting a result should add it to the input 
AND the user should be able to click enter to add an option when it's highlighted
AND after clicking enter the field should still be in focus so the user can continue searching for options
AND only valid results should be allowed to be added to the input field
AND clicking the "X" next to the result should remove it from the input
AND the modal should have a save button
AND the save button should not activate until there is at least one valid result in the input field
AND clicking save should add the team(s) in the input field to the tournament section relative to where the Add Teams button was clicked (Qualifying or main tournament)
AND the modal should close and a green "saved" notification icon (https://zpl.io/awJd8oM) should appear on the Federation Teams Management page. 
AND there should be a cancel button that is always active
AND clicking the cancel button should close the modal
AND when a federation team is added to a tournament, system should add them to any relevant team selection dropdowns
AND when a federation team is added, system should unhide the roster tabs for federation users

title: Unsaved changes page behavior and modal
custom_steps:
As a user, I want to be reminded when I have unsaved changes on a page and attempt to leave the page so that I don't lose my changes.

h2. AC

# When a user is on a page with unsaved changes and they attempt to leave the page, display a modal
## *When a user is on a page with unsaved changes and no missing required fields display this modal* [https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz|https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz]
### Clicking "save changes" will save the changes from the page, close the modal, throw a green success notification "Saved" and navigate the user to where they were trying to go.
### Clicking "discard changes" will discard the changes and take the user to where they originally tried to navigate.
### Clicking the X dismisses the modal
## *When a user is on a page with unsaved changes but there are still missing required fields display this modal* [https://zpl.io/VQ1YAR5|https://zpl.io/VQ1YAR5]
### Clicking "discard changes" will discard the changes and take the user to where they originally tried to navigate.
### Clicking â€œbackâ€￾ dismisses the modal
### Clicking the X dismisses the modal

title: As a BOC Admin, I want the ability to register a user in LDAP
custom_steps:
*NOTE: This story is a work in progress, and may be updated/closed*

In order for a user to get authenticated, they need to be registered in LDAP. They can self-reg, but if processes change, a BOC Admin may be able to initiate that registration process for a particular user.

*AC:*

* The admin or user will enter the userâ€™s email in self reg
* If the LDAP account does not yet exist, they input the userâ€™s name, email, selected role, and other metadata.
* LDAP WBC Admin can then go to user administration and retrieve list of pending users
* WBC Admin can approve the user and assign the role of BOC Administrator, WBC Federation Admin, or WBC Federation user. The user is then added to the wbc-users group in LDAP and the appropriate role group - wbc-boc-admin, wbc-fed-team-admin, wbc-fed-team-user
* The user would appear in the list of users within WBC. A WBC admin can then assign a federation for the user

title: Update Player eligibility
custom_steps:
If a player with an eligibility status of pending is removed from the the interest list that status should be removed. Currently if a pending player is removed from the interest list and added again their eligibility status is still "Pending" on their profile, interest list, and eligibility screen. Approved and Denied status should not be changed if the player is removed from the interest list.

To Reproduce:
1. Submit a player on the interest list for eligibility
2. Remove the player from the interest list
3. Add them to the interest list

Expected:
The player is no longer pending

Actual:
The player profile is still pending eligibility
